MissingSerialVersionUID.description:
Description

Serializable classes should provide a serialVersionUID field.
The serialVersionUID field is also needed for abstract base classes. Each individual class in the inheritance
chain needs an own serialVersionUID field. See alsoShould an abstract class have a serialVersionUID.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
MissingSerialVersionUID.option: This rule has no specific options.
